All Classes

Class Description
ClientInitializer
Really doesn't do much.
Composition
The main class that you want to extend from.
CompositionFactory  
CompositionRegistryException
This exception is typically used if the user tries to stitch a Composition which isn't registered in Thimble.
EntityCompositionsStorage  
EntityMixin
This mixin mainly deals with giving Composition objects hooks into their stitched Entity objects.
FloatAwayComposition
This Composition causes any associated Entity to float upwards forever.
ServerInitializer
The entry-point for this example mod.
ServerInitializer
Doesn't do much.
StitchCompositionS2C
This packet is used for facilitating Composition stitching on the client after being done on the server.
SynchronizedKey<T>
A SynchronizedKey object represents the name of a synchronized value to be synced across the network.
SynchronizedKeyException
This exception is typically used if the user tries to use a SynchronizedKey that isn't registered Synchronizer.
SynchronizedType<T>
An interface that serves a reference for when a synchronized value is stored in a CompoundTag or send over the network in a PacketByteBuf.
SynchronizedTypeRegistry
This is the registry for SynchronizedType objects.
SynchronizeEntryPacket
This packet is used for synchronizing a Synchronizer.Entry between the client and the server.
Synchronizer
This is the main class used to sync information across the client and the server.
Synchronizer.Entry<T>
A helper class used to organize a composition of information which is mainly a key-value pair.
Thimble
This is the main class that should be used by mod authors.
TimeBombComposition
This Composition causes any associated Entity to emit smoke and eventually explode after a certain amount of time.
WandItem
This is just meant as a test item for the example compositions.
WorldChunkMixin
This mixin class only modifies the addEntity method in order to make generic Composition objects possible.
